title: Niobrara National Scenic River: Geologic Formations
body: Geologic Formations         Cracked Cliffs NPS photo  The cliffs along the Niobrara River reveal millions of years of the earth's history. For a description of this geological "layer cake", click to download a PDF of our geology bulletin.You will need Acrobat Reader to open this file. Acrobat is free, and you can download it here.
